text: @mattgaetz In Matt Gaetz' 'Merica: your job is Coronavirus tracing, no other countries want you to visit, you "adopt" anyone you can from latin American countries and pay them next to nothing for their work. Also, you drive around, high on booze and pills and ask mommy and daddy for money.
